summary: Project includes configuring a website/app hero section (image by direct URL with styling overlay) and completing an end-to-end instance-dependent flow with follow-up steps and testing.
architectural_notes: Hero section should support external/direct image URLs as the background source
Hero image styling requirements: bottom-justified background positioning with a 25% dark-blue overlay layer

existing_features.title: Update the homepage hero to use the user-provided direct image URL as the background image, keep the background bottom-justified, and apply a dark-blue overlay at exactly 25% opacity over the entire hero area.

Connect the completed instance proposal submission flow to the next instance-dependent follow-up steps by guiding the user into the proposal they just created (or the relevant instance record) without requiring manual page refreshes or manual navigation.
Run a quick end-to-end smoke test of the full chain (proposal creation through instance-dependent follow-ups) and record the steps and results in a repo document.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow setting hero image via a provided direct URL and bottom-justify the background image
Apply a 25% dark-blue overlay on top of the hero image
Connect the completed flow to any follow-up steps that depend on the instance and verify the full chain works end-to-end

projectName: Connect instance-dependent follow-ups, run end-to-end smoke test, and set hero background to provided direct URL
